title: karuNAkaranAna
sahitya:
karuNAkaranAna gurunAthan varuginrAn kaN vizhitt-ezhundiru manamE


anupallavi

  aruNOdayam pOlE kiraNa jyOti azhagan anbarukk-inidAgum aruL udayantarak-


caraNam 1    cittam teLindiDa jagaviruL azhindiDa jIva malarilE shivanaMam tazhaittiDa
shuddhAnanda jnAna sukha nilai aLittiDa jyOti sutantra bOdham uNarndiDak-
    caraNam 2    jAti mata nira saNDaigaL ozhindiDa samarasa sAdhanam amara 
nilai tara Adi parAshakti aruLuDai nAyakan ANDavan aindozhil 
pUNDavan Anandat-tANDavan ulaguyya vENDiyE iddinam
